verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [V: said] [ARG1: he would soon push for full funding of his promised wall along the U.S. border with Mexico , which could spark budget battles in a Congress fractured over his immigration policy] .
